amendment.description: Amendment removes the Administrator of the EPA from the list of individuals who shall designate a council member to the Federal Permitting Improvement Council.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 19 printed in Part B of House Report 114-326 to the Senate amendment to the text to remove the Administrator of the EPA from list of individuals who shall designate a council member to the Federal Permitting Improvement council in Section 61002 FEDERAL PERMITTING IMPROVEMENT COUNCIL.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A092) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A092) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A092) offered by Mr. Gosar.
